entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Waskaganish
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:50 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Waskaganish Airport 1:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -3.3°C
Pressure: 96.5 kPa
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -6.2°C
Wind: ENE 20 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 9 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
